overview: One night in New York City, Sam, an over worked pediatrician who still can't find "the one", is set up on a blind date with a British romantic named Charlie. Upon arrival she is surprised to find Charlie is not who she was expecting, at all. The pair spend an evening together and a curious connections begins to spark. The surprises keep coming as Sam discoveries a new meaning to the term 'Blind date".
title: Blind Date
